abstract: The “30 Rock” actress poked fun of the heads of NBC Universal and General Electric, as well as her look-alike, Sarah Palin.
snippet: The “30 Rock” actress poked fun of the heads of NBC Universal and General Electric, as well as her look-alike, Sarah Palin.
lead_paragraph: Despite, or perhaps because of, the serious messages of many Advertising Council campaigns — which focus on topics as varied as teen dating violence and hunger in America — the group offered some comic relief at its annual dinner Wednesday night by inviting Tina Fey to host the event, at the Waldorf-Astoria in New York.

headline.main: At Ad Council Dinner, Tart Humor From Tina Fey
